text:
Hey Everyone,

My name is Savan & I recently joined a new tech startup.

I am looking to build my portfolio in tech space, so I would to write on your website if you cover slightest amount to tech!

I have some internal content pieces to showcase my tech writings,  plus I have a solid portfolio in CX Space.

Ideally, I'm looking for ways to get started, so if you know someone who manages tech sites, please feel free to connect me with them.

Looking forward to your support, Superpath community.

Savan
